attributes.action: commit to a final vote by the Public on the any Treaty that will move more of our fundamental Parliamentry Powers to Europe .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this petition is to prevent our current or future governments signing away our own Parliamentry rights without first giving the voters of this country a final say which will be binding on the Government in power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
